text: Any tips for debugging kernel death in `IJulia`? Since moving to rc3 my kernel just randomly dies, and I'm not sure where to even start trying to figure out what's going on.

elements.text: Any tips for debugging kernel death in
? Since moving to rc3 my kernel just randomly dies, and I'm not sure where to even start trying to figure out what's going on.

text: Did you try to rebuild IJulia? Are you on macos? there was some bugs in IJulia on macos on 1.6, but should be fixed inthe latest IJulia release, so make sure you have that

elements.text: Did you try to rebuild IJulia? Are you on macos? there was some bugs in IJulia on macos on 1.6, but should be fixed inthe latest IJulia release, so make sure you have that

text: I'm on 1.23.2 and on Windows, and yes I had to rebuild IJulia as my computer crashed during the first precompile after installing 1.6rc3 (not Julia related), so I had to wipe everything and start from scratch
